messages.content:
NAME: Mansi Advilkar
EMAIL: mansiadvilkar123@gmail.com
PHONE: 400601
9193243368

FULL RESUME:
Mansi Advilkar
Thane (W.)400601
919324336847 | mansiadvilkar123@gmail.com
Objective
Motivated recent graduate in HR with an intrest in operation management. Desire to improve employee
engagement support HR processes and help with talent purchasing. Strong team player and communicator who
is prepared to add a great work environment and assist in coordinating human resources processes with
company goals.
Experience
SystemXs.ai 10-jun-2024 - 10-Nov-2024
Hr intern
- End-to-End Recruitment Management: Led the recruitment process from start to finish, including creating and
posting job advertisements, reviewing resumes, conducting telephonic and in-person interviews, and assisting
in candidate selection.
- Onboarding & Documentation: Managed various aspects of the onboarding process, including preparing
appointment letters, handling joining formalities, and coordinating Provident Fund (PF) documentation with
external consultants.
Induction & New Hire Integration: Supported the smooth onboarding of new employees by assisting in the
coordination and execution of induction programs, ensuring a positive first impression and quick integration
into the company culture.
- HR Administration Support: Provided key administrative support to senior HR professionals, including
document preparation, maintaining HR files, and managing workflow to ensure seamless HR operations.
- Employee Engagement Initiatives: Contributed to the organization of employee engagement activities and
events, fostering a positive and inclusive work environment and supporting employee morale and retention.
- Recruitment Data & Reporting: Assisted in tracking and reporting key recruitment metrics, including time-to-
hire and source of hire, providing insights for process improvements.
Education
Shiv samarath vidyalaya 2019
SSC
71%
Sheth NKTT college 2021
HSC
73.33
Sheth NKTT college 2024
Graduation - BMS (HR)
CGPI 6.45
Skills
Full-Cycle Recruitment & Talent Acquisition
Resume Screening & interviewing
Onboarding & Induction programs
Employee engagement & Event coordination
HR Administration & Document Management
Strong Communication & Interpersonal skills
HR system & Software knowledge
Personal Details
Date of birth - 4 October 2003
Gender - female
Know Language - Marathi,Hindi,English

experience.title: HR Intern
highlights: Led the recruitment process from start to finish, including creating and posting job advertisements, reviewing resumes, conducting telephonic and in-person interviews, and assisting in candidate selection.
Managed various aspects of the onboarding process, including preparing appointment letters, handling joining formalities, and coordinating Provident Fund (PF) documentation with external consultants.
Supported the smooth onboarding of new employees by assisting in the coordination and execution of induction programs.
Provided key administrative support to senior HR professionals, including document preparation and maintaining HR files.
Contributed to the organization of employee engagement activities and events.
Assisted in tracking and reporting key recruitment metrics, providing insights for process improvements.
